message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to both get a good deal.
Your 60/40 split isn't appealing, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a strong offer considering the declining value in later rounds.
Bob, let's not waste any more rounds. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  The longer we wait, the less we both get!
